DOC.brief_title: Investigation Cognitive Function Before After Induced Ventricular Fibrillation Electrophysiological ( EP ) Study
DOC.detailed_description: Patients high risk malignant tachyarrhythmia routinely investigate programmed electrophysiological study ( EPS ) . To investigate hemodynamic effect ventricular arrhythmia cerebral circulation EEG transcranial ultrasound conduct simultaneously EPS . Before EPS neuropsychological test investigation specific blood sample ( Neuron Specific Enolase , NSE ) do .
DOC.criteria: Age > 18 year Positive agreement EPS primary secondary prophylaxis malignant ventricular tachyarrhythmia : primary prophylaxis : Brugada syndrome , long QT syndrome , cardiomyopathy , short QT syndrome secondary prophylaxis : Multicenter Automatic Defibrillator Implantation Trial ( MADIT ) criterion , syncope , document ventricular tachycardia Severe neurological deficit Cardiopulmonary resuscitation
